```{r setup}
library('tidyverse')
library(ggbrookings)
library('palmerpenguins')
```

Check that you have Roboto


```{r}

systemfonts::system_fonts() %>% 
  filter(family == "Roboto") %>% 
  transmute(
    family, style,
    file = str_extract(path, "[\\w-]+\\.ttf$")
  )
```

```{r}
penguins %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = bill_depth_mm, y = flipper_length_mm, color = sex)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_brookings(palette = 'gender1') +
  theme_brookings() +
  labs(title = "Penguins",
       subtitle = "A subtitle",
       caption = "**Caption**") +
  theme(plot.tag.position = 'topleft') +
  facet_grid(.~ island )

```
